data.name: Beyond Enemy Lines 2 - Covert Strike
data.detailed_description:
A intense new Campaign set after the events of Beyond Enemy Lines 2. The russian mafia were involved in the theft of advanced technological research from a US facility and you need to bring it back!

"Intelligence indicates that the Russian mafia were involved in the theft of advanced technological research from a US facility. They’ve set up a lab under the cover of an old weather station high up in the Carpathians."

Features

  • New Story Campaign with 3 Missions
  • New Graphic Set - Winter
  • 1 New Multiplayer Map (CQ_WeatherStation)*

*Multiplayer content is delivered in a Patch free to every owner of Beyond Enemy Lines 2. By purchasing this DLC you get the Singleplayer Mission.

data.short_description: A intense new Campaign set after the events of Beyond Enemy Lines 2. The russian mafia were involved in the theft of advanced technological research from a US facility and you need to bring it back!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790k CPU
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon R9 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
